articles.title: Hyundai Creta sales cross 2.5 lakh: SUV's facelift version coming in mid-2018
articles.description: Launched in July 2015, Hyundai Creta has found 7,986 takers a month on average in India. This indicates Hyundai has sold nearly 266 Creta units a day.

articles.title: WhatsApp: Voice-to-video call switch, add group description and more features
articles.description: WhatsApp has now rolled out new features to the app. The new feature will allow users to add a group description so that users can know what the group is about. Additionally, a user can now switch between voice and video calling.
